Instructions.Value: The Myrmidon is produced by New Earth Trading Company as a cheap alternative to BattleMechs for Chaos March powers. Named after the famous Greek warriors commanded by Achilles, the Myrmidon is based upon the Manticore combat vehicle. It is, however, cheaper than that design and does not lose significant combat capabilities, so it looks attractive to military procurers who are focused on the bottom line. Tracked: High traction, agile turning. Movement: 5/8 Hex: 150/240 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 175 20 Left 125 20 Right 125 20 Rear 120 20 Turret 175 20 Total 720 120
